entry.title: Wordpress blog migrated to Pelican
entry.summary:
This blog was initialy developed on the wordpress. As you know the reasons for that. Wordpress is the most successful and feature rich blogging engine. So I chose it without any doubt. I didn't even search for python related blog engine at that time. But after a while I felt the dificulty of adding some changes to the wordpress code, bugs with the wordpress plugins and more importantly the Web UI to type the blog bost very annoying.

If we are thinking the technical points, wordpress is a dynamic engine, it is over killing for blogs and other wiki based sites. Main issue is the response. The static pages are way faster compared to the dynamic contents. I know wordpress has caching plugins to make the static pages out of dynamic one but that is not a very relaiable solution.

Actually above points are all come to my mind after seeing the static site generators and their awesome featues and flexibility.

Advantages of static site generators are

  1. We are serving html directly so very fast.
  2. Easy maintanence of the site, very less pain with setup DB and other things.
  3. Use your faviourae text editors for blog posting.
  4. It support markdown syntax (Markdown,ResT) - so we just need to type the blogs in normal text with simple formating.
  5. Host it on Github, and very easy version control and site backup.
  6. Very easy to customize the Themes or other internals if you want.
